title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
The first point requires showing that an indeterminate form 0 0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8Xr=y0tbbg9q8qqaqpepec8Eeeq0tXdbba9frFj0=OqFL0dbba9Lq pC0db9Fve9pce9v8qqaq=dir=xirpG0tb9fr=xfr=xfrpeWZqaaeaa biGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaamaalaaabaGaaGimaaqaaiaaic daaaaaaa@37CF@ is present in order to apply L’Hospital’s Rule. Any error in mathematical communication (e.g., writing “ = 0 0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8Xr=y0tbbg9q8qqaqpepec8Eeeq0tXdbba9frFj0=OqFL0dbba9Lq pC0db9Fve9pce9v8qqaq=dir=xirpG0tb9fr=xfr=xfrpeWZqaaeaa biGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaiabg2da9maalaaabaGaaGimaa qaaiaaicdaaaaaaa@38D5@ " or not using limit notation) impacts the second point.

The second point does not require a simplified answer. Trigonometric function values do not need to be evaluated. Any differentiation or computation error impacts this point.

Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes both of the criteria below.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
The first and second points require evidence of quotient rule and chain rule and no errors. At most 1 out of 2 points is earned for partial communication of quotient rule and chain rule with a maximum of one computational error.

The third point is earned for a response that arrives at the given expression rather than an algebraically equivalent expression.

Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes two of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes all three of the criteria below.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
For the second point, trigonometric function values do not need to be evaluated.

Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes two of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes three of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes all four of the criteria below.
